sentences.en: If love and friendship can't be together, I will abnegate the resultless love.
sentences.cn: 如果爱与友情不能并存，那我定会放弃一份无结果的爱。

sentences.en: It can abnegate useless samples and make the knowledge of study objects accumulate.
sentences.cn: 该算法舍弃对最终结论无用的样本，使得学习对象的知识得到了积累。

sentences.en: What a real growth is need courage and faith to try new thing and abnegate old things.
sentences.cn: 真正的成长是要有勇气和信心去尝试新的事物，同时放弃旧有的事物。

trans.tran_en: to deny to oneself; renounce (privileges, pleasure, etc)
